attributes.action: URGENTLY SUPPLY ALL KEY WORKERS WITH P100/N99 FACE MASKS.
attributes.additional_details:
Wearing a face mask in the long run will help protect spreading the disease. Majority of key workers I have seen pictured in the press or at my local supermarket are not wearing masks. Every time I see this I'm extremely concerned, because they are more at risk at catching the virus, I really think the government should act fast and make wearing masks compulsory for all key workers. They are the nations hero's right now, and by not wearing a mask they are putting their lives at risk. 
Thank you
attributes.background:
I would URGENTLY appreciate it,         if this petition could be fast tracked for a debate in Parliament ASAP. 
The government desperately need to supply all key workers with masks, and make it compulsory they wear them whilst working. This will help to protect them, and help prevent more deaths.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these similar petitions:
Protect essential workers from contracting and spreading Covid-19.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306387

Fund and provide safety clothing for the supermarket staff on the frontline:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305874

Make it mandatory to wear a face mask in public during Covid-19 Pandemic:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304397

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
